title: Pbe
body: I got approved to Pbe but I can't even signup for it. I check Pbe status and it said signups are down since 4/4/17 now that I clicked the link to signup would that link still work when it come back up or no?

replies.body: The PBE Signup page is currently down for maintenance! There have been plenty of reported bugs that we need to investigate before we have it back up, so for right now, players won't be able to sign up or create PBE Accounts.
